Author: metalbean
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: Hi,  I have a few questions and hopefully someone can enlighten me.  1. Which exchange platform will the coins be traded after the crowdsale conclusion?  2. Impakcoin was first advertised at "impakcoin.com" and later changed to "impak.eco". The former mentioned crowdsale starting in June and the later said it is starting in August. Why did the project moved the dateline and the naming?

Author: memberx
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: First question would have been answered by reading the white paper, but here for the lazy guys...  Quote Currently Listes or Quoted: The impak Coin (MPK) does not trade on any exchange or market.   Quote 5.9.2 Stable Market Although impak Coin wi ll be supported by a fully dec entralized blockchain (Waves), t he MPK Governance Body will be the central authority regulating the exchange rate and controlling the issuance mechanism. The goal being to assure that impak Coin remains a growth catalyst for t he impak.eco Merchants that accepts impak Coin - based transactions. Furthermore, the MPK Governance Body will have sole responsibility for stabilizing the MPK price. It will do so by setting the price of the MPK on a quarterly basis and executing market ope rations as described further in this document

Author: last2stand
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: Hello, hopefully you will be pleased with my answers  1. Which exchange platform will the coins be traded after the crowdsale conclusion? The impak coin will solely be traded on a primary market hosted by the impak governance organ to make sure of its stability  2. Impakcoin was first advertised at "impakcoin.com" and later changed to "impak.eco". The former mentioned crowdsale starting in June and the later said it is starting in August. Why did the project moved the dateline and the naming? a) The naming has been changed because it made more sense to be part of the impak.eco community we are also building b) We had to postpone the camping launch date because the processes with regulators were longer than expected. Yet, we managed to be the first regulated ICO in north america.

Author: wndrbr3d
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: No posts since July. I think this info will be useful for all MPK HODLers (got from official impak web-site):  • MPK value and exchange rate: The impak Coin is currently and will be worth CAD $1 until the launch of impak Coin transactions in our marketplace. • Description of goods and services basket used as reference for evaluating MPK purchasing power: We’re currently working on this. • Total MPKs issued: 1,615,336 MPKs • Treasury operations carried out by the MPK governance body: This body will be created before the impak Coin issuance. Subsequent treasury operations will then be carried out. • Rewards program modifications: No changes have been made since the October 2017 ICO. • MPK and CAD reserve balances: As indicated in the white paper, MPK and CAD reserves shall be, respectively, 15% of the MPKs sold and 40% of the funds raised, at the time MPKs will come into circulation.

Author: last2stand
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: For the past six months, I have been hard at work with an amazing team, Impak Finance. Together, we dove into an ambitious endeavour - a new cryptocurrency that would be engineered for mainstream usage, fuel the impact economy and be regulator friendly.  To achieve success in life, some say you have to work hard. Others say you have to work smart. Let me tell you, to bring this project to life, we needed to work both hard and smart!   Yet, here we are today, and I am proud to announce that we are officially the first regulatory approved cryptocurrency in all of North America. That being said, I have more good news that can reach you on an even more personal level: impak Coin campaign starts today, meaning that you can now pre-purchase impak Coins with a 20% bonus!  Simply use my VIP code : PASCALSQUAD   I hope this gave you a reason not to hate Mondays anymore (ha!ha!). Pascal  More info about impak Coin : http://imgur.com/a/Vp1wL

Author: Fraublucher
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: No, it's not.  from their whitepaper  "One major innovative point with impak Coin is its stability. Unlike most cryptocurrencies, it will not be traded on exchanges (markets), but rather on a dedicated market managed by impak Finance, and at a pre-established price point. This way, impak Coin will be stable in value, contrary to the usual offer and demand models."  "The price of the MPK in CAD will be established by the MPK Governance Body once every quarter and will be correlated on the evolution of the total transaction value within impak.eco."

Author: last2stand
Title: [ANN][CROWDSALE] IMPAK COIN (MPK) PRESALE STARTS ON JUNE 26th
Body: FAQ SECTION  1. What is the algo ? The infrastructure is based on top of WAVES blockchain which uses an LPOS algo. For generating new MPK, they are created to users who actually are using the ecosystem, close to a cashback system. More details in the white paper.  2. How many coins will there be ? Will it be a reissuable coin ? There is going to be the initial issuance, which depends on the campaign, so we will know on July 26th what the initial amount will be.  Is is going to be reissuable as every month new coins will be added and given to users that actually transacted in the ecosystem, similar to a cashback system.   3. Will the funds be escrowed ? Of course, all funds collected throughout the campaign will be held in an escrow account at one of the largest Canadian lawfirm McMillan L.L.P     4. Which coins will be accepted during the campaign ? We will only be accepting BTC and ETH. Note that shapeshift makes it easy to convert any crypto.  5. Will there be a bounty campaign? There is no bounty campaign as we need the MPK to be backed.
